Summary: Our curve specialists! For bending up to 90” especially on small radii (inner as well as outer radii)

For bending and forming in sheet metal fabrication. Suitable for both straight and curved sheets. Equipped with four roller stops enabling easier handling and better guidance especially on outside radii. Includes a screw-on handle for easier working at maximum bending height.

For bending and forming in sheet metal fabrication. Suitable for both straight and curved sheets. Equipped with four roller stops enabling easier handling and better guidance especially on outside radii. Includes a screw-on handle for easier working at maximum bending height.

Consisting of:

Summary: Starts at 90 and bends up to 180. Creates hem also on inner and outer radii.
Description:
Requires free space at the side for setting on and off.
The ideal supplement to the WUKO Mini Bender and WUKO Uni Bender
Bending height: 8-23 ( 3/16 – 7/8 in)

Summary: Starts at 90 and bends up 180. Creates hem also on inner and outer radii.
Description:
• No need for free space at the side for setting the tool on and off
• Just twist and roller stop by means of the locking bolt
• Place the tool on the right angle bend
• Twish the roller stop bank and start bending
• Increased bending ehight compared to Mini Disc O Bender 4010
Bending height: 8-32 mm ( 5/16 – 1 ¼ in)

Summary: From 0 to 180 with a single tool!
Description:
Equipped with two pairs of bending discs and handle.

Delivered in a carrying case.

Summary: Handy tool for beading, stiffening and offsetting of sheet metal.
Description:
• Four roller stops for easier guidance on straight sheet metal strips
• Quick and easy removal of two roller stops for working on curves
• Adjustable throat depth from 0 to 65 mm (2 ½ in)
• Lower shaft radially adjustable (forming pressure increase)
• Roll sets made of hardening steel equipped with long- life bearings
• Interchangeable roll sets (special roll sets on demand)

Summary: Pair of replacement rollers for WUKO Combo Bender 5000
